critique: The document pertains to civil service rules and regulations, specifically concerning the transition of employees into classified (competitive) service. It outlines conditions for employees to acquire rights as if appointed through competitive examination, including requirements for prior service, non-competitive tests, and considerations for those on compensation rolls. The order aims to provide a pathway for existing employees to gain classified status while ensuring they meet certain standards of fitness and service. It also addresses exemptions for physical requirements and modifies a previous executive order related to classified service.
